meanings.sent1: She restrung her guitar before the concert.
meanings.sent2: He restrung the beads on the necklace.
meanings.sent3: The spider restrung its web with precision.
meanings.sent4: The athlete restrung his racket for better performance.
meanings.sent5: The tailor restrung the pearls on the dress beautifully.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she restrung her violin for the recital.
meanings.sent2: He restrung the broken guitar last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat restrung the yarn all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The memories restrung in her mind as she looked at the old photos.
meanings.sent5: The stars seemed to be restrung in the sky after the storm passed.
